title: attack-group
description: This target type contains an Attack Grouptarget. In addition to the inherited properties, this section defines oneadditional specific property that is valid for this type. For a Caldera Groupexample, see [CalderaGroup] for more details.

type.description: The value of this property MUST be attack-group.

name.description: The group name of the Attack group that should execute the attack command sent to it and all agents that are part of the group.
